title: I submitted a ticket but the link Riot gave me won't work
body: The link that riot gave me to view the ticket I submitted, doesn't work it says error 404 and won't allow me to see if I got help with it or not. Is there anyway this could be fixed or anything? Because I would like to get help with my ticket, anything could help. Thank you. {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
Straaaaange, the link pulls up alright from my end. First off I'd like to have you try logging into the support site and try accessing your tickets from the top of the page there. If that's not working either, you can try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or possibly try to use an incognito or private browser window. 

Let me know if none of that is working for you!

Before I made the ticket, it told me to log out so when I made it there was no account associated with the ticket. I feel as if that might be the reason why, although the email seemed to be sent to my personal email.
